text: Sebastian Suarez (born March 1, 1991), is a Chilean professional basketball player. He currently plays for CD AB Ancud of the Liga Nacional de Básquetbol de Chile. In the 2016-17 season, he played for the Penarol Mar del Plata club of the Argentinean Liga Nacional de Básquet. He represented Chile's national basketball team at the 2016 South American Basketball Championship, where he recorded most minutes and steals for his team.Chile accumulated statistics | 2016 South American Championship for Men, ARCHIVE.FIBA.com, accessed 31 July 2016. title: Sebastián Suárez (basketball)
